Expatriette.title: Expatriette
powers: Discard a card. If it was an ammo card, {Expatriette} deals 1 target 3 irreducible projectile damage. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a power.
One Hero may deal 1 target 1 irreducible projectile damage.
Each player may discard a card. Any player that does draws 2 cards.

openingLines.default: Target locked. Let's make this clean.
openingLines.CitizenDawnCharacter: And here I thought you'd seen reason after all that [b]Aeon[/b] business.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Guess we're going to need some bigger bullets.

MrFixer.title: Mantra
powers: [i]Mantra[/i] deals 1 target 1 melee damage. If a hero target takes damage this way, their player may draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may play a card.
Select a Target. Increase the next damage dealt by that Target by 1 and reduce the next damage dealt to that Target by 1.

openingLines.default: You have a lot to learn. Take this lesson to heart.
openingLines.TheChairmanCharacter: A miscomprehension you may yet live to regret.
openingLines.TheOperativeTeamCharacter: The Dragon's will broke me. only one without fault could grant me peace.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Rage may have helped here. Yet I find myself at peace.

TheHarpy.title: The Harpy
powers: Flip 1 control token. When a {avian} token is flipped this way, draw 1 card. When a {arcana} token is flipped this way, [i]Pinion[/i] deals 1 target 1 infernal damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may play a card.
Each hero may deal themself 1 psychic damage. Any who take damage this way each deal 1 target 1 infernal damage.

openingLines.default: Let's finish this quickly. Diamond Manor cannot be left alone.
openingLines.TheMatriarchCharacter: You'll notice I've had a change in a pinion.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Every end is a new beginning.

Setback.title: Setback
powers: Destroy an ongoing card. If a hero card was destroyed, add 2 tokens to your unlucky pool and draw a card. Otherwise, remove 2 tokens from your unlucky pool and {Setback} deals himself 2 melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a power.
Select a Target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that Target by 2.
Destroy up to two ongoing cards. Only one may be a villain card.

openingLines.default: Hi. Hello! Sorry. Not sure what for yet, but there's always something.
openingLines.KismetCharacter: I've got luck for everybody! Well. Sometimes. Well. Hopefully today.
openingLines.TricksterKismetCharacter: Oh we've got tricks of our own. Right? Guys?
openingLines.PlagueRatTeamCharacter: Well gosh yeah, do that. Wait. Are you injecting the [b]killer rat[/b] with green ooze? [b]why!?[/b]
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Hey uh, Faye? What's going on, is this normal?

LazyFanComix.Greyhat.title: Greyhat
powers: Play 1 card. Treat any card played this way as if it were the first card played this turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may deal 1 target 1 energy damage.
One player may destroy one of their ongoing or equipment cards. If they do, they may play a different card from their trash.

openingLines.default: Keep your lines open. They can't withstand a group of linked heroes.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: This threat is bigger than anything. Everyone link up.
